**Example 1: 示例**



Input: 

```
tccli iotvideoindustry ControlRecordStream --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --DeviceId 34020000001180000036_34020000001320000092 \
    --StreamId 1038455659 \
    --Command {"Action":"pause"}
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "d3d6f466-f2c2-44df-b78b-383ba717a3d8"
    }
}
```
